catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Taught by Elvira DiFabio and members of the Department. For honors seniors writing a thesis. Successful completion of two terms of Italian 99 is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators. Students who do not complete a thesis are required to submit a substantial paper in order to receive either 4.0 credits for each part of the series.
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: French 98 OR Italian 98 OR Portuguese 98 OR Spanish 98 OR Romance Studies 98 OR Latin American Studies 98
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for students writing a senior thesis in Italian. Part two of a two part series.
